As much as I love this game I have to rate it fairly, at the moment I'm playing the matchmaking is just broken. I play survivor and I get paired with alright killers that it's actually fun to play against but then my teammates are just brain-dead and without teamwork there's no way I can escape and get better matchmaking but because I ONLY GET BRAIN-DEAD MATES I don't get out and my skill-based matchmaking keeps going down and the killers stay the same but my teammates are so stupid that you can't do anything about it and you just stay in that matchmaking and cant change it and instead of having fun it makes me want to die. It's fun when you are low level and get carried but the more hours I stick into this sh*t the more I realize how bad the matchmaking is. People get rewarded for bad ping on both sides, and players get rewarded for toxic and trolling behavior that no one cares enough to fix it, at the moment the player base keeps going down just because of the reason I listed up above, the glitches and the hit-boxes are just broken and the ping is more of a reward then a punishment. If you want to have fun play as a survivor play with friends otherwise you'd wonder how people this iq less can even work out steam. Rank reset is just there to give bloodpoints it serves no point anymore because skill based matchmaking is now a thing and is just bad. If you want to play alone your better of playing killer but then you'd also get bulllied but good survivors cuz that's just how it is. Most of the time I have in this game was spent in loading screens and lobbys then actually playing. If you want to buy every dlc then it's like 100$ but you can also farm money in game but that will only take like one year to actually get that amount of in game money. I can recommend it but only if you have strong nerves because this game will make you question everything.

🔲 Qualquer coisa que conduza energia
🔲 Uma calculadora com 1 pilha
🔲 Roda em PC Humilde
✅Um i5 com uma GTX 750TI
🔲 No minímo uma GTX 1660
🔲 Pc com CPU e GPU muito boas
🔲 4xRTX2080TI ligadas numa hidroelétrica

- HISTÓRIA
🔲 História? que história?
🔲 Tem uma historinha (bem chatinha e infantil mas tem)

- JOGABILIDADE
🔲 Precisa de dois dedos pra jogar
🔲Aceitável (4 dedos pra ser específico)
✅ Jogabilidade bacana
🔲 Jogabilidade excelente

- COMPLEXIDADE
🔲 Jogo da velha é mais complexo
🔲 Fácil de entender
🔲 Fácil de aprender, difícil de dominar

- DIFICULDADE
🔲 Você escolhe a dificuldade
🔲 Seu cachorro consegue
🔲 Da pra zerar com uma batata de controle
🔲 Fácil
✅ Normal
🔲 Quase Dark Souls, ativando ou não o MODO DEUS
🔲 Dark Souls
🔲 Você precisa de reflexos instantâneos e 4 mãos

- TEMPO DE JOGO
🔲 Da jogar enquanto ouve 1 música
🔲 6h
🔲 12h
🔲 24h
🔲 48h
✅ 100h+
🔲 Você começa, seu neto termina

🔲 Muito bom
🔲 Perfeita

- BUGS
🔲 Nunca vi nenhum
✅ Pequenos bugs
🔲 Pode ficar irritante
🔲 Pode estragar a gameplay
🔲 Parece até uma lâmpada acesa cheia de inseto

🔲 Adolescentes
